description.value:
Disciples of the Cycle believe that all aspects of existence follow the endless cosmic cycle of ignition and entropy. They believe that the universe was and will be destroyed and remade by these cosmic forces, and that this ever-changing duality connects everything in the universe. Many solarians follow this philosophy, learning to wield these creative and destructive forces in battle through meditation and training.

Edicts cultivate your own cosmic spark, embrace vitality and void as one, meditate on the nature of the Cycle

Anathema create imbalance in a system, participate in the unnatural destruction of a stellar body, resist natural cycles
